title.rendered: “The Knowledge I Gained in Digiperform is Beyond Books” – Rinku Tulsiani

content.rendered:
“The most difficult thing is the decision to act, the rest is merely tenacity. The fears are paper tigers. You can do anything you decide to do. You can act to change and control your life; and the procedure, the process is its own reward.” — Amelia Earhart In life, change is the only constant. At times, we fear change but overcoming those fears and committing to change is a victory! If you’re strong enough to make that tough decision, you’re also strong enough to go through the career change process and be victorious.  Digiperformer Rinku Tulsiani decided to take command over her career path and led it towards Digital Marketing. Readout more about her journey!

It’s a pleasure to connect with you! Before heading further, we would like to know a bit about you.

I was a banking professional and I chose to bring in a change to my career and learn something new. Hence I took up a course in Digital Marketing, and I enrolled myself in Digiperform.

What originally attracted you to choose digital marketing as your career?

Its creativity and dynamics attracted me to choose digital marketing as a career.

What exactly makes us stand out from the competition & urge you to choose us over others?

The training provided at Digiperform is very good. And the knowledge and education shared is beyond books. A lot of real-life examples and experiences are shared. This gives us a better understanding of the field.

Tell us about your favorite experience you had with us, whether as a learner or as a customer?

While we got the opportunity to run our own paid campaigns on Facebook, with the support of Digiperform.

Would you consider Digiperform as a trusted & reliable resource for Digital marketing training? Why?

Yes, I would consider it the most trusted and reliable source for Digital Marketing training, since they deliver what they promise.

If you were to review our training program, what score would you give it out of 10?

I would give it 10.

Where do you see yourself in the next 5 years?

I see myself reaching greater heights in the Digital Marketing industry.

If you had a piece of advice to someone just starting out, what would it be?

I would recommend them to enroll for digital marketing since this field has got a lot to do for everyone, irrespective of career or educational backgrounds.

Finally, Describe Digiperform in one line.

Excellent place, Great support received from every staff.
